sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们庆祝公司成立十周年。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen qìngzhù gōngsī chénglì shí zhōunián.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous célébrons le dixième anniversaire de l'entreprise.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We celebrate the company's tenth anniversary.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 中国有很多有趣的成语。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhōngguó yǒu hěn duō yǒuqù de chéngyǔ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La Chine a beaucoup d'expressions idiomatiques intéressantes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: China has many interesting idioms.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 降低成本是公司的目标。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jiàngdī chéngběn shì gōngsī de mùbiāo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Réduire les coûts est l'objectif de l'entreprise.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Reducing costs is the company's goal.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shuāngfāng zhōngyú chéngjiāo le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les deux parties ont finalement conclu l'affaire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Both parties finally closed the deal.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège fāngfǎ hěn yǒu chéngxiào.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette méthode est très efficace.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This method is very effective.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā jīngcháng chūchāi qù wàidì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il voyage souvent pour affaires.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He often travels on business trips.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Chéngchē shí qǐng jì hǎo ānquándài.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez attacher votre ceinture de sécurité en voiture.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please fasten your seatbelt when riding in a car.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shíjiān bù zǎo le, wǒmen chí le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il se fait tard, nous sommes en retard.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: It's getting late, we're running late.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè běn shū gāng chūbǎn bùjiǔ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce livre vient d'être publié.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This book was just published recently.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Huāyuán lǐ yǒu yī gè xiǎo chízi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a un petit bassin dans le jardin.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There is a small pond in the garden.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhèlǐ de wèidào hěn chòu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ça sent très mauvais ici.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: It smells very bad here.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Chéngkè qǐng dào dēngjīkǒu děnghòu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les passagers sont priés d'attendre à la porte d'embarquement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Passengers please wait at the boarding gate.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yùndòng hòu tā chū le hěn duō hàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a beaucoup transpiré après l'exercice.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He sweated a lot after exercising.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā cóng chénglǐ bān dào le xiāngxià.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a déménagé de la ville à la campagne.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He moved from the city to the countryside.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā juéde zìjǐ zhǎng de chǒu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il pense qu'il est laid.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He thinks he is ugly.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Māma zài chúfáng zuòfàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Maman cuisine dans la cuisine.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Mom is cooking in the kitchen.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng bǎ xiāoxi chuándì gěi dàjiā.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez transmettre le message à tout le monde.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please pass the message on to everyone.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Chúxī yè quánjiārén tuánjù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Toute la famille se réunit le soir du réveillon du Nouvel An chinois.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The whole family gathers on New Year's Eve.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā chūyú hǎoxīn bāngzhù biérén.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il aide les autres par bonté.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He helps others out of kindness.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 项目初期遇到了一些困难。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xiàngmù chūqī yùdào le yīxiē kùnnan.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le projet a rencontré quelques difficultés au début.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The project encountered some difficulties in the early stage.
